briefTitle: Physical Activity and Balance Changes in Operated Patients Because of Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Physical Activity and Balance Changes in Operated Patients Because of Breast Cancer
conditions: Balance and Physical Activity Deficits After Breast Surgery
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* patients who had breast cancer surgery

Exclusion Criteria:

* balance disorders, physical disability that will affect balance (polio sequelae) and neurological diseases with balance system and/or peripheral nervous system involvement (diabetic neuropathy and familial/genetic neuropathies, Parkinson's Disease, Multiple Sclerosis, Alzheimer's Disease), bone metastasis, patients who have undergone reconstructive surgery
